Tyler, the Creator and Adult Swim’s “Black Dynamite” are Making a Police Brutality Musical

posted by Graham on December 22, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
Image via Tumblr

“Black Dynamite” is one of Adult Swim’s best and most daring shows. Michael Jai White stars as the shows titular crimefighter, and they’ve pulled in stars like Chance the Rapper (as Bob Marley) and Erykah Badu to fill the shows prolific guest spots.

Now Badu is coming back to the show, starring alongside Tyler, the Creator in “The Wizard of Watts,” airing January 10. It’s a musical episode about police brutality: Black Dynamite goes on vacation only to be caught in the middle of a riot and catch a brick to the head. Watch for it in the coming weeks. Here’s a screenshot from the episode:
